segments.text: The boy is quite high up on that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the legs of the stool are splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, almost ready to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far to reach those cookies, pushing his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear he's going to lose his footing and fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could easily tip backward, sending him tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height, especially onto a hard floor, could be very painful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he doesn't get hurt while trying to get his treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It would be such a shame if this moment of mischief ended in an injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right there too, very close to the precarious situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scenario makes me extremely nervous and on edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would secure that stool or help him down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a dangerously unstable way to get a simple snack.
segments.speaker: PAR
